text: aur hamane to bahuteree bastiyaan barabaad kar dee jo apanee maishat (rojee) mein bahut itaraahat se (zindagee) basar kiya karatee theen-(to dekho) ye un hee ke (ujade hue) ghar hain jo unake baad phir aabaad nahin hue magar bahut kam aur (aakhir) ham hee unake (maal va asabaab ke) vaaris hue
